title: Rats
details: Domestic charge applies for up to 3 visits to the property and applies to single, occupied premises not in multiple occupation. Communal gardens are charged at the commercial rate. Additional visits at £35 each.

title: Rats
details: Includes external treatment where necessary. Additional visits at £40 each.

title: Mice
details: Domestic charge applies for up to 3 visits to the property. Any additional visits required will be charged at £40 each.

title: Squirrels
details: Domestic charge applies for up to 4 visits to the property. Any additional visits required will be charged at £40 each.

title: Fleas
details: Domestic charge covers 1 visit to the property to treat a two-bedroom property. For larger properties add £25 per additional bedroom.

title: Cockroaches
details: Domestic charge covers 2 visits to the property. Any additional visits required will be charged at £80 each.

title: Bedbugs
details: Domestic charge covers 2 visits to the property for up to two rooms treated. Additional rooms are charged at £55 each Any additional visits required will be charged at £100 plus £27.50 for each additonal room over 2. A charge of £30 will apply if we arrive and find that the client has failed to prepare rooms correctly resulting in a postponement of the service. This is payable before any further work is booked.

title: Pharaoh ants
details: Domestic charge covers 2 visits to the property. Any additional visits required will be charged at the commercial rate

title: Garden ants
details: Per treatment. Please note that we do not operate services to control ants in garden or open areas but will treat premises where ants are entering them.

title: Wasps
details: Charges are for the treatment of a single wasp nest and do not cover removal – which is rarely necessary. Additional nests treated at the same time are charged at £30 each. Removal of nests following treatment, where necessary and accessible, will be charged at our commercial hourly rate in addition to the treatment charge.
